mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM somday.Notice AS n JOIN somday.NoticeCategory AS nc ON n.categoryId=nc.id AND (n.categoryId="CT02" OR n.categoryId="CT03" OR n.categoryId=#{majorNoticeCategory}) LEFT JOIN somday.Major AS m ON n.majorId=m.id
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM somday.Notice AS n JOIN somday.NoticeCategory AS nc ON n.categoryId=#{categoryId} AND n.categoryId=nc.id;

SELECT n.id "id", n.title "title", LEFT(n.content, 15) "content", n.registeredAt "registeredAt", n.updatedAt "updatedAt", nc.id "category.id", nc.name "category.name", m.id "major.id", m.name "major.name" FROM somday.Notice AS n JOIN somday.NoticeCategory AS nc ON n.categoryId=#{categoryId} AND n.categoryId=nc.id LEFT JOIN somday.Major AS m ON n.majorId=m.id ORDER BY n.registeredAt DESC LIMIT #{startList}, #{listSize}

SELECT n.id "id", n.title "title", LEFT(n.content, 15) "content", n.registeredAt "registeredAt", n.updatedAt "updatedAt", nc.id "category.id", nc.name "category.name", m.id "major.id", m.name "major.name" FROM somday.Notice AS n JOIN somday.NoticeCategory AS nc ON n.categoryId=nc.id AND (n.categoryId="CT02" OR n.categoryId="CT03" OR n.categoryId=#{majorNoticeCategory}) LEFT JOIN somday.Major AS m ON n.majorId=m.id ORDER BY n.registeredAt DESC LIMIT #{startList}, #{listSize}

SELECT n.id "id", n.title "title", LEFT(n.content, 15) "content", n.registeredAt "registeredAt", n.updatedAt "updatedAt", nc.id "category.id", nc.name "category.name", m.id "major.id", m.name "major.name" FROM somday.Notice AS n JOIN somday.NoticeCategory AS nc ON n.categoryId=#{majorNoticeCategory} AND n.categoryId=nc.id AND n.fix=true LEFT JOIN somday.Major AS m ON n.majorId=m.id

SELECT n.id "id", n.title "title", LEFT(n.content, 15) "content", n.registeredAt "registeredAt", n.updatedAt "updatedAt", nc.id "category.id", nc.name "category.name", m.id "major.id", m.name "major.name" FROM somday.Notice AS n JOIN somday.NoticeCategory AS nc ON n.categoryId=#{categoryId} AND n.categoryId=nc.id AND AND n.title LIKE "%#{searchWord, jdbcType=VARCHAR}%" LEFT JOIN somday.Major AS m ON n.majorId=m.id ORDER BY n.registeredAt DESC

SELECT n.id "id", n.title "title", LEFT(n.content, 15) "content", n.registeredAt "registeredAt", n.updatedAt "updatedAt", nc.id "category.id", nc.name "category.name", m.id "major.id", m.name "major.name" FROM somday.Notice AS n JOIN somday.NoticeCategory AS nc ON n.categoryId=nc.id AND (n.categoryId="CT02" OR n.categoryId="CT03" OR n.categoryId=#{majorNoticeCategory}) AND n.title LIKE "%#{searchWord, jdbcType=VARCHAR}%" LEFT JOIN somday.Major AS m ON n.majorId=m.id ORDER BY n.registeredAt DESC

SELECT n.id "id", n.title "title", n.content "content", n.registeredAt "registeredAt", n.updatedAt "updatedAt", ni.id "image.id", ni.imageUrl "image.url", nc.id "category.id", nc.name "category.name", m.id "major.id", m.name "major.name" FROM somday.Notice AS n JOIN somday.NoticeCategory AS nc ON n.id=#{id} AND n.categoryId=nc.id LEFT JOIN somday.Major AS m ON n.majorId=m.id LEFT JOIN somday.NoticeImg AS ni ON n.id=ni.noticeId ORDER BY n.registeredAt DESC
